hero.description: Iustus Mercatura - Latin for "Just Trade" - delivers essential food commodities with integrity, transparency, and a commitment to sustainable global commerce.

about.title: The Philosophy of Just Trade
about.leadText: At Iustus Mercatura Holding Inc., we prioritize integrity, transparency, and long-term partnerships to create lasting value across global markets.
about.description: Our dual-location model in the British Virgin Islands and vibrant economic regions worldwide exemplifies our strategic approach. We are deeply committed to upholding the highest ethical and sustainable business practices, strictly adhering to UN standards and ISO 9001 quality management principles.

ceo.name: Dr. Gerhard Kral
ceo.quote: "We have not only positioned the Holding Company as a strategic management holding, but also moved away from purely trading in food commodities towards establishing the complete supply chain - from the field to the end customer."

footer.tagline: Connecting farmers to consumers to deliver essential food, feed and fuel to the world.
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 Iustus Mercatura Holding Inc. All rights reserved.

leadership.name: Dr. Gerhard Kral
leadership.description: Visionary Chief Executive Officer who established the company's global strategy on the foundational philosophy of 'Just Trade'. Under his direction, the company is driving strategic vertical integration through initiatives like Project Iustus Agricultura Brazil SA and the Uganda Refinery Project 2026.

leadership.name: LLM Christian Thomas
leadership.description: Group Chairman and acting Chief Compliance Officer serving as chief steward of the company's vision and ethical mandate 'Just Trade'. He provides long-term strategic guidance and governance overseeing major initiatives.

leadership.name: Lic. jur. Martin Bohler
leadership.description: Legal expertise combined with strategic vision. Co-founded the company and drives risk management and corporate governance.

ceo.name: Andreas Zsifkovits
ceo.description: CEO of Iustus Mercatura Maritime Logistics UK Limited, leads global shipping and freight operations. He ensures the cost-efficient, reliable movement of commodities, translating the 'Just Trade' mandate into operational excellence.

ceo.name: Miss Resty Nankya
ceo.description: CEO of Iustus Mercatura Uganda Limited, leads the dedicated African team with passion. She spearheads the transformative Uganda Refinery Project 2026, driving local value creation and securing long-term regional growth.

ceo.name: Stephanie Shi
ceo.description: Leads Asian market strategy and expansion. Deep expertise in cross-cultural business development and regional trade networks.

cooRegional.name: Eng. Yong Jiang
cooRegional.description: COO of Iustus Mercatura USA Inc., leveraging 30+ years of experience in the Asian commodities market. He ensures operational excellence, establishing resilient Brazil-to-Asia supply chains.

cooRegional.name: Paulo R. de Souza
cooRegional.description: COO of Iustus Mercatura Brasil Ltda., strategic leader leveraging 30 years of hands-on expertise in the Brazilian sugar trade. He ensures robust operational control and keeps close contact to local Suppliers and Farmers.

cooRegional.name: Capt. Eng. Patrick Duggie
cooRegional.description: COO of Maritime Logistics UK, drives operational excellence. He uses his expertise to guarantee the secure, cost-efficient delivery of global commodities, upholding the 'Just Trade' principles.

cooRegional.name: Jimmey S. Shah
cooRegional.description: Sales Director Middle East/Asia (Dubai), drives sales and growth across crucial regional markets. He is also the CCO for FITC Energy Group DXB LLC.

cooRegional.name: Mozafor Rahman
cooRegional.description: COO of Iustus Mercatura Bangladesh, leads regional operations and market development in South Asia. Expert in local supply chain management and trade partnerships.

cooRegional.name: Marianna Tavares
cooRegional.description: External legal counsel providing expert guidance on international trade law, compliance, and corporate governance.
